title: Drink, Swear, Steal and Lie
lyrics: I was twelve when Daddy said to meDon't take to drinking boy, that road don't lead to nowhereAnd don't you ever let me hear you swear...don't you dareHe told me stealing is a lazy man's waySomething for nothing leaves you hell to paySo don't lie...then you can look the whole wold in the eye(Honey I try)But since I met you girl, I'm breaking every ruleI must confess I'm just a backsliding foolI want to drink from your lovin' cupSwear I'll never give you upSteal all your kisses underneath the moonI wanna lie here close to you, look what you made me doDarlin' you're the reason whyI drink, swear, steal and lieLast night I threw away my twelve-step bookI finally faced the fact that I am hooked on youThere's nothing more that I can do (ain't no use)'Cause every time I see your angel faceMy halo disappears without a trace (I swear)Girl, I admit I haven't got a prayer (but I don't care)Well I know this ain't exactly how I was raisedBut heaven help me honey I ain't changing my waysI want to drink from your lovin' cupSwear I'll never give you upSteal all your kisses underneath the moonI wanna lie here close to you, look what you made me doDarlin' you're the reason whyI drink, swear, steal and lieI want to drink from your lovin' cupSwear I'll never give you upSteal all your kisses underneath the moonI wanna lie here close to you, look what you made me doDarlin' you're the reason whyI drink, swear, steal and lieDrink, swear, steal and lie
